content: get fawncy for the holidays with this nostalgic crochet blanket designed in red heart super saver this throw is worked in the ever-popular corner-to-corner technique you ll stitch small join-as-you-go block motifs to create a colorful pixel design using double_crochet chains and slip stitches as your canvas customize your deer and winter forest scene using any colors you like from the extensive super saver palette then show it off for all to admire size 47 x 57 / 119 5cm x 144 5cm red heart super saver 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast a soft white 0316 - 5 balls contrast b light sage 0631 - 1 ball contrast c jade 3862 - 2 balls contrast d burgundy 0376 - 1 ball contrast e blue 0886 - 1 ball contrast f charcoal 3950 - 1 ball contrast g light blue 0381 - 1 ball contrast h light periwinkle 0347 - 2 balls crochet hook size us i/9 5 5mm gauge 12 double_crochet x 7 row = 4 / 10cm
